text: Update: We’ve re-tried this scenario with our older, non-themed modules and it no longer works, so it’s not just a theme issue. Was there maybe a backend change that wiped out that module map?  I know this wasn’t a sanctioned featured, but it let us generate a fairly true-to-prod staging portal, which is a pretty crucial thing for us.

Hey friends!  Our next podcast is going to be on site speed/ optimization.  If you have questions you would like us to discuss or suggestions for other developers that we can talk about, add them to <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/The-next-HubSpot-Community-Developer-Podcast-Site-speed-and/m-p/429095|this thread> and we will wax poetic on the topic :grinning:
